about_the_game:
"Traveler's Tavern" is a simulation management game, in which the player will act as a boss and manage a tavern in the wilderness.
You'll build the tavern from the ground up, designing and furnishing the interior, choosing the right furniture to make the layout of the store more logical. At the same time, you also need to hire employees, such as shopkeepers, shop chefs, shop assistants and lukeboys, to ensure that customers receive high-quality services and delicious food.
In addition to running the tavern, you will also be threatened by monsters wandering around the wilderness. Fortunately, they only want money. If they are willing to spend money to resolve the disaster peacefully, then it would be perfect. Of course, if you really don't want to pay, there is naturally a way to resolve it peacefully.
In Traveler's Tavern, your goal is to build a prosperous tavern and attract more customers. By providing great service, cooking delicious food, unlocking new recipes, and improving the reputation of the tavern, you can attract more adventurers and travelers, while constantly expanding the size of the tavern. In addition, you can also participate in different events and win medals and bonuses by defeating competitors in business.

name: Traveler's Tavern

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM

short_description: "Traveler's Tavern" is a business simulation game. Your goal is to build a prosperous tavern and attract more customers by providing high-quality service, cooking food, unlocking new recipes and improving the reputation of the tavern.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
